metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1839 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The xmlDictAddString function in libxml2 before 2.9.4, as used in Apple iOS before 9.3.2, OS X before 10.11.5, tvOS before 9.2.1, and watchOS before 2.2.1, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted XML document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
